title: Caton
body:
Stellar Properties

Caton is a very large sun that burns with a blue-white light. As such, it is destined to have a relatively short life-span.

Visibility on Heru

Caton appears as a similar size to Earth's sun in the Heruvian sky, however its light causes frequent deep blue and purple skies. However, the summer often brings elevated levels of airborne sand and debris that cause a softer yellow hue.
preface: Caton is the name of the sun in the Heruvian Solar System.
